column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Iroh says : " Here is your tea .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Perhaps I am .
#Text=" Toph says : " I know what you 're thinking ... I look like I ca n't handle being by myself .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I was n't thinking that .
#Text=" Toph says : " You would n't even let me pour my own cup of tea !
#Text=" Iroh says : " I poured your tea because I wanted to and for no other reason .
#Text=" Toph says : " People see me and think I 'm weak .
#Text=They want to take care of me , but I can take care of myself , by myself .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You sound like my nephew , always thinking you need to do things on your own , without anyone 's support .
#Text=There is nothing wrong with letting the people who love you help you .
#Text=Not that I love you , I just met you .
#Text=" Toph says : " So where is your nephew ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 've been tracking him actually .
#Text=" Toph says : " Is he lost ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Yes , a little bit .
#Text=His life has recently changed and he 's going through very difficult times .
#Text=He 's trying to figure out who he is and he went away .
#Text=" Toph says : " So now you 're following him .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I know he does n't want me around him right now , but if he needs me , I 'll be there .
#Text=" Toph says : " Your nephew is very lucky , even if he does n't know it .
#Text=Thank you .
#Text=" Iroh says : " My pleasure .
#Text=Sharing tea with a fascinating stranger is one of life 's true delights .
#Text=" Toph says : " No , thank you for what you said .
#Text=It helped me .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm glad .
#Text=" Toph says : " Oh , and about your nephew , maybe you should tell him that you need him , too .
#Text="
